name: Space Krash
description:
Aliens have taken over the station, your bosses are ignoring the problem, it's up to you to save the day in Space Krash, a Lumen game. Space Krash is inspired by Arkane Studio's Prey, and is all about exploring the Erebus-1 Space Station. Fight off the NAAX, an alien species from another dimension, and try to not get killed by your employer trying to 'clean up' the situation. Wield fun powers with fully customizable characters and try to make it through another day!

In this 23 page game, you'll find everything you need to make characters, how to play the game, and tables to help you run it! Please enjoy!

A short note: Space Krash does have themes of mind control/loss of agency. If these are not for you, please do not get this game. 

Space Krash is a Lumen Game, so full thanks must go to GilaRPGs!
